name: Casa Cuevas - Patrimonio - Prensado
additionalNotes: Luis Cuevas Jr. and his son Alec, created the Casa Cuevas Patrimonio. A full-bodied cigar, the Patrimonio (which is Spanish for patrimony) pays tribute to Luis Cuevas Sr., who after he left Cuba, continued in the family tradition of producing top-quality cigars. The Casa Cuevas Patrimonio features a flawless, red-hued Honduran Corojo Colorado wrapper. It is expertly hand crafted at the Cuevasâ€™ Tabacalera las lavas, SRL factory in the Dominican Republic.
